General_Description: '''Dye Dye Dye''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Blood and dirt stains are less noticeable on darker fabric! Head east across [[Erymanthos Peaks]] to the village of [[Boura]]. They specialize in fabric production. Find me in a large vat of red dye.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
